field.label: Unsubscribe All Emails
field.comment: If using different storeviews, the same email can be subscribed several times in Magento (since Magento 2.4). As each contact can be distributed among different Maileon newsletter accounts, Magento needs to know the storeview to mark contacts as "subscribed" or "unsubscribed". Maileon realizes this by passing the storeview ID along the calls but if it is not available, this option handels the behavior. If set to true and storeview_id is missing, all contacts with the same email address will be unsubscribed. If set to false, the unsubscription will be ignored, so best is to properly set up the parameter passing and/or setting this to true.
